objects.text:
Limited time offer! Experience the
perfect blend of comfort & style.
Breathable mesh, cushioned insole,
and responsive midsole technology.

product_details.name: Nike Air Max 1 'Fresh Mint' - Classic Comfort Meets Modern Style
product_details.description:
• Iconic Air Max 1 silhouette with premium green and grey colorway
• Durable combination of mesh and suede upper materials
• Visible Air cushioning unit in heel for superior comfort
• Classic white midsole with black rubber outsole for excellent traction
• Breathable mesh toe box and panels for enhanced ventilation
• Signature Nike Swoosh branding in fresh mint green
• Padded collar and tongue for enhanced comfort and support
• Versatile design perfect for both casual wear and athletic activities
• Lightweight construction for all-day wearability
• Retro-inspired design with contemporary comfort technology

banner_details:
The banner features a dynamic diagonal split background transitioning from deep navy blue to vibrant orange, creating a bold and energetic contrast. At the top left corner, there's a strong headline (`tagline`) in large, condensed white uppercase text, designed to demand attention. Just below it, a subtitle (`heading`) in vivid orange highlights the product offer. Beneath the subtitle, a smaller paragraph (`description`) provides promotional context and product benefits in clean white font. Emphasized text (`discount` and `price`) showcases an attractive discount in bold styling, with the main price (`price`) in large white typography. The original price (`original_price`) is subtly shown in desaturated red further down, enhancing the perceived value.

A clear call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) sits just above the baseline and is styled in bright orange with white uppercase text. On the right, a stylish sneaker (`product_image`) is angled for visual appeal, overlapping into the orange half and presenting the product front and center. Abstract overlays, stars, and soft shapes add modern flair throughout the background (`background`), harmonizing with brand elements.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #001F3F
- Vibrant Orange: #FF851B
- Crisp White: #FFFFFF
- Accent Red: #FF4136
product_color: This product image showcases a sleek, modern aesthetic using a classic monochrome palette. The shoe prominently features contrasting black and white leather panels. Black (#1C1C1C) outlines and frames major segments of the shoe, adding boldness and definition. White (#F9F9F9) dominates the base and Nike swoosh, creating a clean and sharp contrast that grabs attention. The laces are off-white (#EAEAEA), subtly separating from the pure white for texture. Meanwhile, the midsole is a speckled light grey (#D8D8D8), providing a neutral transition between the upper and the dark sole. These colors blend seamlessly yet remain individually distinct, emphasizing minimalism and modernity.
